comment: Constants related to an album item, including {@link Cursor} column names

variables.name: ID
variables.comment:
* Unique ID of an album. This ID is both provided by and interpreted * by a {@link CloudMediaProvider}. *

* Each album item must have a unique ID within a media collection. *

* A provider should return durable IDs, since they will be used to cache * album information in the OS. *

* Type: STRING

variables.name: DISPLAY_NAME
variables.comment:
* Display name of a an album, used as the primary title displayed to a * user. *

* Type: STRING

variables.name: DATE_TAKEN_MILLIS
variables.comment:
* Timestamp of the most recently taken photo in an album, in milliseconds since * January 1, 1970 00:00:00.0 UTC. *

* Type: LONG * * @see CloudMediaProviderContract.MediaColumns#DATE_TAKEN_MILLIS * @see System#currentTimeMillis()

variables.name: MEDIA_COVER_ID
variables.comment:
* Media id to use as the album cover photo. *

* If this field is not provided, albums will be shown in the Photo Picker without a cover * photo. *

* Type: LONG * * @see CloudMediaProviderContract.MediaColumns#ID

variables.name: MEDIA_COUNT
variables.comment:
* Total count of all media within the album, including photos and videos. *

* If this field is not provided, albums will be shown without a count in the Photo Picker. *

* Empty albums should be omitted from the {@link CloudMediaProvider#onQueryAlbums} result, * i.e. zero is not a valid media count. *

* Type: LONG

variables.name: AUTHORITY
variables.comment:
* Authority of the album item *

* Type: STRING * * @hide

variables.name: IS_LOCAL
variables.comment:
* Whether the album item was generated locally *

* Type: STRING * * @hide

variables.name: ALBUM_ID_SCREENSHOTS
variables.comment:
* Includes local media present in any directory containing
         * {@link Environment#DIRECTORY_SCREENSHOTS} in relative path
         *
         * @hide

variables.name: ALBUM_ID_CAMERA
variables.comment:
* Includes local images/videos that are present in the
         * {@link Environment#DIRECTORY_DCIM}/Camera directory.
         *
         * @hide

variables.name: ALBUM_ID_VIDEOS
variables.comment:
* Includes local and cloud videos only.
         *
         * @hide

variables.name: ALBUM_ID_DOWNLOADS
variables.comment:
* Includes local images/videos that have {@link MediaStore.MediaColumns#IS_DOWNLOAD} set.
         *
         * @hide

variables.name: ALBUM_ID_FAVORITES
variables.comment:
* Includes local and cloud images/videos that have been favorited by the user.
         *
         * @hide
